Package me.julb.library.utility.date

Class DateUtility

java.lang.Object
me.julb.library.utility.date.DateUtility
public final class DateUtility extends Object
A date utility to generate standard formatted date and date times.

  • Method Details

    • dateTime

      public static String dateTime(Date date)
      Returns the UTC date time in ISO 8601 format.

      Example: 2018-08-01T16:14:27.965Z

      Parameters:
      date - the input date.
      Returns:
      the UTC date time serialized in ISO 8601 format.

    • dateTimeNow

      public static String dateTimeNow()
      Returns the "now" UTC date time in ISO 8601 format.

      Example: 2018-08-01T16:14:27.965Z

      Returns:
      the "now" UTC date time serialized in ISO 8601 format.

      public static String dateTimeToRfc1123(String datetime, TimeZone timeZone)

      Parameters:

      timeZone - the time zone.
      Returns:
